content.raw: Would it be helpful for the migration guide to give some high-level advice, like "`Node::Advertise` callback functions for services should now return a boolean by a value instead of having a boolean output parameter"? Since there are so many different overloads of `Node::Advertise`, I'm not sure how else we could communicate the changes.
